fields.summary: Title and navBarHidden Properties are not working in case of single window iOS
fields.environment: iOS 5.1, MAC OSX 10.7.5, Titanium Mobile SDK 2.1.2.GA and 2.1.3.GA, Titanium Studio 2.1.2

comments.body: I tried this sample code, but not getting window title and navBarHidden property is not working too, if i am using single window like this.
Same behavior(No title bar and navBAR) i get when i open a window from a click event of a view/button and not setting modal to true..
A single window does not have a navigation bar. It needs to be part of a tab group, navigation group, or modal window
